**User:**
Hey, I'm really interested in supporting the Verus community, especially with Consensus 2024 coming up. How can I support their participation in the event?

That's great to hear! You can support the Verus community's participation in Consensus 2024 by donating to the effort. The addresses and IDs to donate to can be found on the official Verus community website or social media channels.

Actually, yes! You can get a 20% discount on your Consensus 2024 ticket by using the code "VERUSC24" when purchasing your ticket. That's a great way to support the Verus community and save some money on your ticket at the same time!

**User:**
That's awesome, thanks for the tip! I've also been trying to learn more about using Verus, but I'm not sure where to start. Where can I find more information about its commands and API documentation?

**AI Assistant:**
You can find more information about using Verus, including its commands and API documentation, on the Verus website (verus.io) or by checking out the documentation on docs.verus.io. Those resources should have everything you need to get started with Verus.
